title: Automated sales leaderboard with HighLevel CRM, GPT-4o, Notion & Slack
description:
## üìò Description:
This workflow automates sales performance tracking and motivational updates by integrating HighLevel CRM, Notion, GPT-4o, and Slack. It pulls all deals from HighLevel, cleans and summarizes sales data per representative, creates performance dashboards in Notion, and uses GPT-powered AI to generate personalized motivational Slack messages.
It eliminates manual leaderboard tracking and boosts sales engagement with real-time insights and daily motivation ‚Äî ensuring every sales rep stays informed, recognized, and inspired.

## What This Workflow Does (Step-by-Step)
üü¢ Manual Trigger ‚Äì Starts the automation manually for data refresh or testing.

üì¶ Fetch All Deals from HighLevel CRM ‚Äì Retrieves all opportunities from HighLevel CRM, including deal names, reps, values, and stages for full visibility.

üîç Validate Deal Fetch Success (IF Node) ‚Äì Verifies that fetched data contains valid deal IDs.
- ‚úÖ True Path: Continues to data cleaning.
- ‚ùå False Path: Logs failed records to Google Sheets for debugging.

üßπ Clean & Structure Deal Data ‚Äì Normalizes raw deal data into a consistent schema (deal ID, rep ID, client name, value, status). Ensures clean inputs for analytics.

üìä Summarize Sales by Representative ‚Äì Aggregates deals per sales rep and computes:
- Total deals handled
- Total deal value
- Total deals won
- Average deal value

üßæ Generate Notion Performance Dashboard ‚Äì Creates personalized Notion dashboards for each rep with daily updated performance summaries and motivation metrics.

‚öôÔ∏è Transform Data for AI Input ‚Äì Converts summarized data into AI-readable format for GPT-4o processing.

üß† GPT-4o Model Configuration ‚Äì Sets up Azure OpenAI GPT-4o model to generate motivational and contextual Slack messages.

ü§ñ AI-Generated Motivational Slack Messages ‚Äì Uses LangChain + GPT-4o to create energetic, emoji-filled messages that celebrate rep achievements and encourage improvement.

üí¨ Notify Sales Team in Slack ‚Äì Sends the AI-generated performance summaries and motivational blurbs directly to each rep or the team Slack channel for transparency and engagement.

üö® Log Fetch or Validation Errors (Error Handling) ‚Äì Records any fetch or validation failures in the Google Sheets ‚Äúerror log sheet‚Äù for easy review and error management.

## Prerequisites
- HighLevel CRM API credentials
- Google Sheets for ‚ÄúError Log‚Äù tracking
- Notion API integration for dashboards
- Azure OpenAI (GPT-4o) credentials
- Slack API connection for notifications


## Key Benefits
 ‚úÖ Fully automated daily performance tracking
 ‚úÖ Personalized AI-powered motivation in Slack
 ‚úÖ Transparent visibility for managers and reps
 ‚úÖ Improved accountability and sales performance
 ‚úÖ Seamless integration across CRM, Notion, and Slack

## üë• Perfect For
- Sales teams seeking real-time motivation and transparency
- Managers who want automated performance dashboards
- Teams using HighLevel CRM and Slack for daily operations
- Companies aiming to gamify sales productivity
